text: my tipping point at Cancer Treatment
Centers of America really came before I
joined the company as CEO and I've been
in conversations with the company taking
a hard look at the company and then I
actually spent some time with a patient
a cancer patient who had been treated at
CTCA and that's when the light went on
for me I never had a person customer sit
and look me in the eye and say if it
weren't for this company I wouldn't be
alive and the inspiration for me in that
knowing how much science we have left to
do in cancer and how much wisdom we need
to inject into healthcare in America was
really my tipping point what I hope I
can bring to the Gir role is a
combination of certainly my experience
I've relished my role as an intrapreneur
and as an entrepreneur and I've learned
quite a bit about that
I guess my experience as a lawyer and as
a developer of people hopefully will add
to that as well I really love creative
people I love having great people around
great ideas I hope that I can
participate and I already have
participated with some students who come
here with an idea and they're moving out
of here with a business plan and with a
passion to really bring something to
life
you
